function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Testing hypothesis about the effect of coping methods on different types of buildings","Impact":"Incorrect conclusions about the effectiveness of coping methods in different building types","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate and representative sample of buildings, account for confounding variables","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data visualization tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research team, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate or biased demographic analysis","Impact":"Misunderstanding the statistical community and making incorrect assumptions","Mitigation":"Use representative sample, account for demographic variables, validate data","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, demographic data collection tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research team, public health organizations"}]}
